{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3269269,"name":"guy","username":"soroka","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/s/3ab097/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-12-26T18:36:21.179Z","cooked":"

Hello,
I’m a senior at 2630 and am in charge of our new limelight 3, It has worked many times before and suddenly after changing a battery to one with 12.4V I turned it on and the limelight caught smoke. I immediately turned off the robot, and the limelight was the only thing that caught on fire. Has this happened to anyone before/does anyone know how or why this happened?

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":5,"updated_at":"2023-12-26T18:36:21.179Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":31,"reads":431,"readers_count":430,"score":241.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":446895,"topic_slug":"limelight-3-released-smoke","display_username":"guy","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":61850,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/limelight-3-released-smoke/446895/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3269270,"name":"Connor C","username":"Connor-8177","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/connor-8177/{size}/234521_2.png","created_at":"2023-12-26T18:38:55.188Z","cooked":"

My guess is that there was a short somehow. Check the limelight’s wiring, take pictures, and reach out to limelight support. They’re very helpful

Consider:

Sorry though, I’ve got nothing without more info. iirc limelight has reverse current protection.

This happened to us at our offseason competition in 2021 with a limelight 2. I believe it was due to the wires being stripped to far and making contact with each other. @Link2815 may remember the specifics. Does the limelight still work?
